game_description: LAX VR is an immersive first-person VR lacrosse game, designed exclusively for Meta Quest. You can play offense, defense, and goalie in various game modes, including 6v6 Box, Braveheart, Shooting, Longstick Defender, Goalie, Wall Ball, Shoot Around, and our historical Medicine game. This exciting new feature brings the fast-paced action of 6v6 Box lacrosse to the virtual world. Additionally, we recently introduced the Medicine Game, paying tribute to the Indigenous People who created lacrosse, adding a historical richness to the gameplay. One of the unique features of LAX VR is its touch controller physics system, which mimics the real-life feel of a lacrosse stick. In addition, LAX VR is a family-friendly game with no in-app purchases. You can enjoy the full game experience for a one-time cost, without worrying about additional costs or hidden fees. LAX VR also allows players to compete with others globally via a leaderboard system. You can compare your skills with players from around the world and strive to reach the top of the leaderboard. LAX VR is the ultimate VR lacrosse game that offers a fun and realistic gaming experience. The game's various modes, including the thrilling Box lacrosse mode, provide opportunities for players to practice their skills and become better players.
